itemDescription: Welsh Congregational minister, lexicographer and author

wikipedia_page.main: John Bodvan Anwyl, also known as J. Bodvan Anwyl, (1875 - 1949) was an English-born Welsh Congregational minister, lexicographer, editor, translator, and author.

response: *John Bodvan Anwyl - Fy hanes i fy hunan
**John Bodvan Anwyl is appointed secretary of the Welsh dictionary project sponsored by the Board of Celtic Studies of the University of Wales.
